name: Mandy's Daring Journey
description:
Mandy’s Daring Journey is a puzzle platformer shooter that tells of a little Mandragora, whose family has been kidnapped by an evil witch who wants to use it as an ingredient for a potion, it will be up to Mandy (the smallest in the family) to save them from certain death, but to do so he will have to embark on a daring journey through the lands of this world.

-DISCLAIMER-

The game that you're gonna play game is just a prototype!

Is VERY short,  is very unpolished, and is lacking a lot of features, in the future, if I receive some good feedback, I'll come back to this project to finish the game.
